}

[[=]]
[[span style="font-family: 'Copperplate Gothic'; color: #B61805; font-size: 280%"]]**The Art of Vikander-Kneed Technical Media**[[/span]]
[[/=]]
-----
[[div style="border:solid 2px #000000; color:#000000; border-radius: 10px; background: #BBBBBB; padding:5px; margin-bottom: 10px; padding:10px; font-family: 'Georgia'"]] 
Recently, Foundation researchers at [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/on-guard-43-hub | Site-43]]] led by Memetics Section Chair Lillihammer have catalogued a series of images being disseminated by GOI-5889 (“[[[vikander-kneed-technical-media-hub | Vikander-Kneed Technical Media]]]”).  The following are the most prevalent examples of said images, stripped of harmful memetic content.  If you see such an image outside of a research setting, please report the incident and source of the image to your on-Site RAISA representative.

[[=]]
[[=image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/grigori-karpin-s-author-page/recruitmentflyer width="400px"]]

[[=image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/grigori-karpin-s-author-page/recruitmentflyer2 width="400px"]]
